statements: SELECT * FROM OnlineRetailOrders;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM OnlineRetailOrders;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM OnlineRetailOrders;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM OnlineRetailOrders;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount, shipping_address FROM OnlineRetailOrders;
SELECT * FROM OnlineRetailOrders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM OnlineRetailOrders WHERE total_amount < 50;
SELECT * FROM OnlineRetailOrders WHERE order_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM OnlineRetailOrders WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM OnlineRetailOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM OnlineRetailOrders ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM OnlineRetailOrders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM OnlineRetailOrders WHERE total_amount > 500;
SELECT SUM(total_amount) FROM OnlineRetailOrders;
SELECT AVG(total_amount) FROM OnlineRetailOrders;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OnlineRetailOrders;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) FROM OnlineRetailOrders GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM OnlineRetailOrders LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM OnlineRetailOrders OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM OnlineRetailOrders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Customers
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers
SELECT customer_id, email FROM Customers
SELECT name, address FROM Customers
SELECT * FROM Orders
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM Orders
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, name, total_amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_order_amount FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, MAX(total_amount) AS max_order_amount FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, MIN(total_amount) AS min_order_amount FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_orders FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, name, email, COUNT(*) AS num_orders FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, MAX(total_amount) - MIN(total_amount) AS order_range FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) - MIN(total_amount) AS order_diff FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM Customers WHERE phone_number='1234567890';
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM Products WHERE description LIKE '%electronics%';
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM Orders WHERE quantity < 3;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 3 OR customer_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE name LIKE '%samsung%' AND price < 1000;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 5 AND product_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE description IS NULL;
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email NOT LIKE '%hotmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products;
SELECT product_id, category FROM products;
SELECT * FROM order_details;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM order_details;
SELECT order_id, product_id FROM order_details;

SELECT c.customer_name, o.order_date, od.quantity, p.product_name FROM customers c, orders o, order_details od, products p WHERE c.customer_id = o.customer_id AND o.order_id = od.order_id AND od.product_id = p.product_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, o.total_amount, p.product_name, od.quantity FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, SUM(o.total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id;
SELECT p.product_name, SUM(od.quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM products p JOIN order_details od ON p.product_id = od.product_id GROUP BY p.product_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS total_orders FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id;
SELECT p.category, AVG(p.price) AS avg_price FROM products p GROUP BY p.category;

SELECT c.customer_name, o.order_date, p.category FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, o.order_date, SUM(p.price * od.quantity) AS total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY c.customer_id, o.order_id;

SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, total_price FROM Order_Items WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM Categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id > 5;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE unit_price < 50.00;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, total_price FROM Order_Items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM Categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'S%';
